headline: Does First Solar Still Offer Value After Its 195% Five Year Surge in 2025?
summary: If you are wondering whether First Solar at around $255 a share is still attractively valued, or if the market has already priced in all the positive developments, this article will walk you through what the numbers indicate about its value. The stock has cooled off slightly in the very short term, down 2.9% over the last week and 4.4% over the last month, but it is still up 37.2% year to date and 27.9% over the past year, with a substantial 195.5% gain over 5 years.
